titlestmt.titleproper: Preliminary Inventory to the Stefan Thomas Possony papers
titlestmt.author: Finding aid prepared by Hoover Institution Archives Staff

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using the Archivists' Toolkit 2016-08-08T16:35-0700

change.item: Revised to include box numbers 309-338, not yet described.
Revised to update encoding and add unitid.
Added preliminary inventory of boxes 1-282, updated encoding.
PUBLIC "-//Stanford University::Hoover Institution Archives//TEXT (US::CSt-H::::Stefan Thomas Possony Papers)//EN" "" converted from EAD 1.0 to 2002 by v1to02.cdl.xsl (2004-09-16).

physdesc.extent: 315 manuscript boxes, 5 cubic foot boxes, 2 oversize boxes, 16 card file boxes, 1 oversize folder

did.abstract: Correspondence, writings, reports, research notes, bibliographic card files, and printed matter relating to military science, technology, national defense, international relations, Soviet foreign policy, revolution in the twentieth century, and communism.

accessrestrict.head: Access
accessrestrict.p: The Hoover Institution Archives only allows access to copies of audiovisual items. To listen to sound recordings or to view videos or films during your visit, please contact the Archives at least two working days before your arrival. We will then advise you of the accessibility of the material you wish to see or hear. Please note that not all audiovisual material is immediately accessible.

userestrict.head: Publication Rights
userestrict.p: For copyright status, please contact the Hoover Institution Archives.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Identification of item], Stefan Thomas Possony papers, [Box no.], Hoover Institution Archives.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Acquired by the Hoover Institution Archives in 1978.

accruals.head: Accruals
accruals.p: Materials may have been added to the collection since this finding aid was prepared. To determine if this has occurred, find the collection in Stanford University's online catalog at http://searchworks.stanford.edu/. Materials have been added to the collection if the number of boxes listed in the online catalog is larger than the number of boxes listed in this finding aid.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content of Collection
scopecontent.p: Correspondence, writings, reports, research notes, bibliographic card files, and printed matter relating to military science, technology, national defense, international relations, Soviet foreign policy, revolution in the twentieth century, and communism.

did.unittitle: South Africa's case at the International Court of Justice
The Geography of Intellect, including files on psychology
"Aggression and Self Defense. The Legality of US Action in South Vietnam"
Testimony before the Senate Internal Security Subcommittee (before Berkeley riots),
Miscellaneous manuscripts, articles, speeches, reviews, conference papers, and writings by others
Translation on USSR military affairs - US Department of Commerce
Microform of captured German documents (Foreign Office documents from the National Archives)
Miscellaneous, including photographs of Saigon bookstores
Lenin: The Compulsive Revolutionary, clippings and research cards
The decay of an ideology, preliminary notes,
Thailand's Kra Canal project (with General Edward Black)
Miscellaneous manuscripts, articles, speeches, reviews, conference papers
Manuscript (partial) under alias of Peter Lawrence Riley on Soviet affairs, with accompanying letters
Writings and conference papers by others and printed matter
Miscellaneous lists pertaining to Possony's work
Research cards: Possony's method of preparing for lectures and seminars
Research cards: Listed publications and articles sent for publication
Research cards: Selective catalog of Possony's private library
Books received by Possony from the Stanford Library
"The Politics in Mozart's Operas," manuscript and research materials

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Includes the original Spanish version of the book Plot against the Church: Complot contra la Iglesia, US Catholic Conference materials, and WACL conferences, 1972, 1974.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Includes correspondence with the Naval Institute.

did.unittitle: Draft for Hoover Institution's Yearbook on International Communist Affairs
Papers for the International Strategic Studies Association Strategy Banquet Conferences
Defense and Foreign Affairs Daily articles,
Defense and Foreign Affairs Daily, printed copies with articles,
Testimony before the International Commission on Marihuana and Drug Abuse,
Correspondence with Hoover Institution's publications committee,
Correspondence, including with publishers, contains some writings,
Memorandum by Possony to Bishop McNicholas (draft statement on Marxism),
Proceedings, "National Security: The Demands of Strategy and Economics," Center for Strategic Studies, Georgetown University,
South Africa's case at the International Court of Justice research material
Lenin: The Compulsive Revolutionary, research materials, photocopies of German documents
"Bolshevik Revolution Project," research material and manuscript sent to Life Magazine,

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Later used for Lenin book. Includes plan of operation and "Stalin: Stool Pigeon or Revolutionary?"

did.unittitle: The Russian Revolution: Research Material by Stefan Possony (4 volumes)

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Sent to Life Magazine and used for Allen Moorhead's four part article "50 Years of Revolution," November 1957.

did.unittitle: "Freedom in the Wake of Hegel and Marx,"
"Defense in a N-Dimensional World," published in Will There Be War?
"The Myth of Marx," Buenos Aires conference,
"Soviet Russian Antisemitism, Part I," published in Plural Societies,
"From Gulag to Guitk," published in Ukrainian Quarterly
Writings, including some correspondence and articles for Defense and Foreign Affairs Daily,

Papers on facts about various countries sent to Leigh Johnson (Bank of Montreal researcher), articles sent to Rheinischer Merkur, Ethno-Autistic Thinking and published in Plural Societies, along with other articles,
Writings by others, including research materials, general
Writings by others, including research materials, Ryan, Paul B.
Proceedings, "National Security: The Demands of Strategy and Economics," Center for Strategic Studies, Georgetown University,
Manuscript and research material (including index cards) on the assassination of John F. Kennedy by Lee Harvey Oswald
Research material (including index cards) on genocide for the International Court of Justice
Manuscript by William M. McGovern (former intelligence officer, then professor)
Correspondence of Kernbach with Schramm, Wellems, Pabst

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Includes memoirs of Arnold Rechberg on the origins of World War II.

did.unittitle: Writings for, and correspondence with, Die Welt

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Includes letters from Kissinger, Nixon, and Rockefeller.

did.unittitle: American Association for the Advancement of Science abstracts,

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Includes paper for San Francisco meeting, "Space and the Longevity of Man."

did.unittitle: Various research materials and writings on space, intelligence, terrorism, and other subjects, including some correspondence

unittitle.title: A Strategy for Peace through Strength,

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Includes correspondence with John M. Fisher, with whom Possony collaborated on the book.

did.unittitle: "The Big Hole in Psychological Operation," proposal,
"Italy: Has the Old Man Been Discovered?,"
Part II of the basic material sent to Life Magazine,
"Successes and Prospects," written for Military Science and Technology,
Memo on genocide in the ancient world,

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Includes correspondence with Cyrus H. Gordon.

did.unittitle: "Antisemitism in the Russian Area," Plural Societies,

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Includes Possony's testimony, "Historical Antecedents of Soviet Terrorism."

did.unittitle: Memo to be sent to Minister of Defense
Acceptance speech at Military Academy when receiving honorary degree
Writings, published in Die Welt, Rheinischer Merkur, etc.
Defense and Foreign Affairs Daily articles
Long memo to General George J. Keegan (not published) and correspondence, as well as papers on military questions,
"Regionalization of the USSR," Part IV/3, "Irrationality of Nomenklatura"
"Regionalization of the USSR," Part IV-Appendix A, "Soviet Irrationality - Decline of Soviet Agriculture"
"Regionalization of the USSR," three other appendices
Manuscript on ideological issue (freedom vs. coercion)
Foreign Policy Research Institute, five papers
Lenin project research material used for Life Magazine four-part article and for Lenin: The Compulsive Revolutionary

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Includes correspondence with Julius Epstein (collaborator for the project) and index and photostats of German Foreign Ministry Archives documents (1867-1920) microfilmed at Whaddon Hall for General Library, University of California at Berkeley, 1957 (regarding, among other things, German support of communists through embassies in Bern, Stockholm, etc.).

did.unittitle: Vienna State Archives materials relating to the Russian Revolution Project
Photographs used for Lenin: The Compulsory Revolutionary
Materials relating to Lenin: The Compulsory Revolutionary
Photostats of The Brain of the Army and manuscript for Lenin book
South African trial in the Hague
World War II radio broadcasts and clippings
Photocopies and manuscripts of Russian/Lenin Project and excerpts
Original typed manuscript of Geography of the Intellect, co-authored by Nathainel Weyl
World War II radio broadcasts of Possony, World War II clippings, and World War II writings by Possony
Personal notebooks of Possony (holograph), related correspondence, manuscripts and records of writings, dictation records of the Lenin book
